title: phalanxmine
author: phalanxmine
created_time: November 18, 2022, 01:47:27 PMLast edit: November 22, 2022, 02:04:58 PM by phalanxmine
content: PHALANXMINE.COM                                                                                                   Welcome to Phalanxmine.com! Our goal is to make it easier for You, the miner, to find the right coin to mine! We believe that we can achieve that by having a wide variety of minable coins available.However, just let us know if you don't find the coin you are looking for and we might add it to the pool!The stratum is located in Sweden at the moment, however, we do have plans on expanding - adding stratums to other locations around the globe. Stay tuned for that!Features available:High profits for miners by lowering latency and stale shares.Low fee with only 0.5% for Pooled mining and 1% for Solo mining.The pool is covering all transaction fees.Blocks are distributed proportionally among valid submitted shares (PROP).High security / DDOS protection.Hourly payments.Manual payout threshold.And most importantly: We care for your profits.We have 50+ supported Coins, which adds to 25+ algorithms available on the pool.(We take mining seriously and like to stay up-to-date - We scan the network for new/old coins alike, and add them to the pool frequently.)Support:We are available on Discord primarily, but you may also reach us by email.Discord: https://discord.gg/quEDXb7G8eEmail: contact@phalanxmine.comHappy mining!  Sinecerly Zekko of Phalanxmine.com

comments.author: phalanxmine
comments.created_time: November 22, 2022, 02:53:30 PMLast edit: November 29, 2022, 10:42:10 AM by phalanxmine
comments.body: New additions to the pool!The major overhaul of the pool's front end is now complete, and we've added 25+ coins to the pool since then:(Listed coins are sorted by algorithm) Algorithm: comments.author: phalanxmine
comments.body: New stratum added to the pool!We're happy to announce that the pool is expanding even further!Another stratum location has been added, which is situated in Asia (Singapore).This will allow miners from Asia to be a part of an ever expanding and evolving project, and an awesome community!URL: asia-stratum.phalanxmine.comStay tuned for more additions in a near future!Sincerly,Zekko
